super super clean

Taking OFFERS

[url]jvanderbeck@verizon.net[/url]

So am I the only one that thinks he should post a picture of the blank back?
I agree, come on man !! Not that we don't trust you but damn !! That's like selling a Lenox back without showing the back !!

[quote name="Gradedcardman" post=1668004]I agree, come on man !! Not that we don't trust you but damn !! That's like selling a Lenox back without showing the back !![/QUOTE]

Adam, I know that you and Josh are right, but all blank backs are pretty much alike. What are you worried about, paper loss?  :D

Sean,

Absolutely !! If I read his comment correctly, we are both simply picking on Johnny !! Although some back could have adhesive or other imperfection me.

I LOVE YOU GUYS!;)

I will be posting a back picture later tonight....

this is a great card!  The only known example, tough southern leagurer!!

taking offers , will consider trading for a green cobb in a 1  also:)

[quote name="Sean" post=1668018]Adam, I know that you and Josh are right, but all blank backs are pretty much alike. What are you worried about, paper loss?  :D[/QUOTE]

Just to see it Sean. It's like a tease lol.

Wow the back is super nice too! Otey is one of my fav SL cards good luck with the sale!

;)

Nice card, bud.
